title: Game keeps crashing

embed.description: 000000.003| OKAY| Riot::RADS::Reader::RadsMain::Initialize: RADS library initializing with specified working directory "Y:\League\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.181\deploy".

body:
Hi there,

Hoping someone can help. I've had a look through the log file and can see many missing textures/files/animations. I've run the repair three times, uninstalled and reinstalled, uninstalled and reinstalled on a different SSD and still continue to get 3-4 crashes in every game.

I scoured the internet and couldn't find a solution :(

Cheers

replies.body: Missing files definitely isn't good! Since doing the usual reinstall hasn't been working, there might actually be a few corrupted files which are the culprit. Let's use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure everything is wiped clean and reinstalled properly.
